entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as having a matted hair with congealed blood and purple-and-black bruises on his face and hands. He is also limping and has a puffy slit for an eye.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as gazing up at Hagrid in horror.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as suspecting that Hagrid has broken ribs and demanding to know what happened to him.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is described as dancing around the group trying to lick their faces.

relationships.description: Hermione is gazing up at Hagrid in horror.
Harry demands to know what happened to Hagrid.
